title: 5 states account for over 72% of country's total active Covid-19 cases: Govt
description: Maharashtra alone accounts for 51.23 per cent of the total active cases in the country, the ministry said.

title: Chhattisgarh: Complete lockdown to be enforced in 8 districts from today amidst rise in CoVID-19 cases
description: In Chhattisgarh, eight districts will be under total lockdown amid rise in CoVID-19 cases. Lockdown will begin in Rajnandgaon, Bemetra and Balod districts from this evening.

title: India's daily covid-19 case count nears all-time high of 1.5 lakh

title: Chhattisgarh 10th Board Exam 2021 postponed due to COVID19 surge
description: Chhattisgarh 10th Board Exam 2021 has been postponed due to COVID19 surge in the state. The examination was scheduled to begin on April 15, 2021.

title: Chhattisgarh CM Bhupesh Baghel takes his first dose of COVID-19 vaccine
description: Raipur (Chhattisgarh) [India], April 9 (ANI): Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Bhupesh Baghel on Friday took his first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine at Pt Jawahar Lal Nehru Memorial Medical College in Raipur.

title: Chhattisgarh Board CGBSE postpones Class 10 exams

title: Cut GST on COVID-19 medicines, devices: Chhattisgarh CM Bhupesh Baghel at PM meet
description: In the meeting, the chief minister requested the Centre to provide one week of required vaccines stock in advance as this would facilitate smooth vaccination in remote districts.

title: Open Vaccine to All: From Delhi to Chhattisgarh, Here's All the States That Have Made the Demand
description: Delhi Health Minister on Thursday has requested the Central government to allow vaccinations for all adults to contain the rising number of covid-19 cases in the country.

title: COVID-19 Second Wave: Is Odisha Staring At Chhattisgarh-Like Situation? - Odisha Bytes
description: The Institute of Life Sciences (ILS), Bhubaneswar, on Thursday said that there is a strong possibility of the alarming rise in COVID-19 cases in Odisha like the neighbouring Chhattisgarh.

title: 'Bringing Country's Effort To Fight Coronavirus Down': Health Minister Tears Into Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh Govts
description: Coming down heavily on Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray-led government, Vardhan said the statements made by public representatives in Maharashtra about shortage of vaccines is nothing but an attempt to divert attention from repeated failures to control the spread of pandemic.

title: ‘Don’t delay treatment for COVID-19’, advises Chhattisgarh HM as cases spike
description: Raipur (Chhattisgarh), Apr 07 (ANI): As COVID-19 is spreading fast in Chhattisgarh, state’s Home Minister Tamradhwaj Sahu urged people to get timely treatment. “People are advised not to delay treatment for COVID-19. Separate centers will be made for patients coming for check-up, requiring a ventilator, oxygen,” said Tamradhwaj Sahu. Chhattisgarh reported 9,921 new infections on April 06 taking the tally of the state to 3,68,269.

title: Complete lockdown imposed in Raipur, Chhattisgarh till April 19
description: Complete lockdown in Chhattisgarh Raipur: The Chhattisgarh government on Wednesday imposed a total lockdown in the capital Raipur from April 9 in the wake of a steep hike in coronavirus cases

title: Covid-19: Chhattisgarh govt imposes complete lockdown in Raipur from April 9 to April 19
description: The Chhattisgarh government has imposed complete lockdown in capital Raipur from April 9 to 19 in view of a surge in coronavirus cases.

title: Complete lockdown in Chhattisgarh's Raipur from April 9-19
description: A complete lockdown in Chhattisgarh's Raipur has been imposed from April 9 till April 19. The lockdown restrictions will be effective from 6 pm onward on April 9.

title: Chhattisgarh reports 9,921 new COVID-19 cases, 53 deaths in last 24 hours
description: Raipur (Chhattisgarh) [India], April 7 (ANI): Chhattisgarh reported 9,921 new COVID-19 cases, 1,552 recoveries and 53 deaths in the last 24 hours, as per the state Health Department on Tuesday.

title: Chhattisgarh sees new all-time high of 10,000 daily Covid-19 cases
description: With the detection of 9,921 fresh Covid-19 cases on Tuesday, Chhattisgarh saw its highest single-day spike since the outbreak of the infection in March last year, taking the state's caseload to 3,68,269, a health department official said. With 53 more deaths caused due to the viral infection and co-morbidities, the statewide toll mounted to 4,416, the official said. The state has witnessed 54,171 coronavirus cases and 561 deaths in the last one month.

title: Chhattisgarh records highest-ever 9,921 new COVID-19 cases
description: Raipur, Apr 6 (PTI) With the detection of 9,921 fresh COVID-19 cases on Tuesday, Chhattisgarh saw its highest single-day spike since the outbreak of the infection in March last year, taking the states caseload to 3,68,269, a health department official said.

title: Covid-19: Madhya Pradesh to limit movement of people from Chhattisgarh
description: Madhya Pradesh chief minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan said that to curb the spread of Covid-19, movement of people from Chhattisgarh will be restricted. Only those who need to come for "necessary and unavoidable work" will be allowed.
